turns.utterance: I really enjoyed that movie Titanic growing up, i didnt even know it was a true story.
turns.response: Yup, its probably the best romance-disaster film in existence. I still cry when I see it.

turns.utterance: Imagine if he had gotten on a boat! he might still be alive today
turns.response: I mean its still a fictionalized account so I don't think his character existed in real life. Or did he?

turns.utterance: wait, what are you saying? it didnt really happen?
turns.response: It did, Cameron shot footage of the actual "Titanic" wreck. What I meant to say is that I don't know if DiCaprio's character existed in reality

turns.utterance: oh, well i think thats something i need to look into then.
turns.response: Agreed, it might have simply been a reconstruction of the actual events "Titanic" or it may have been just a way of telling the story.

annotation.comment: special situation: system corrects user (Jack Dawson is a fictional character...)
